name: The Nest Sauvignon Blanc 2022 - Lake Chalice
Rosato Puglia N.V.
description: Dry and fruits notes win (Berries, Stramberry, Orange)

name: Governo All’Uso Toscano 2020 - Oro Italiano
description: A sensational wine for less than a tenner

name: 1954 Primitivo Puglia 2019 - Cantine Paradiso
description: Flavors of vanilla plum black fruit oak. Very tart but balanced

name: Brunello di Montalcino 2017 - Castello Giulio
description: On the palate a perfect balance of fruitiness, floral notes in wonderful accompaniment of dry herbs, subtle wood and subtle hints of cigar tobacco. The silky tannins seem well matured, perfectly integrated and interwoven. An excellent interplay of all components until the wonderfully long finish!

name: Mason Road Chenin Blanc 2021 - Brookdale Estate
description: Crushed stones, lime, chalk, white citrus, white pear, subtle oak spice,, mineral structure, mouth-coating citrus purity, granitic freshness
